title: How to Build Self-Confidence & Self-Belief!- with Chris Powell and Heidi Powell⁣ ⁣
description: Transformation is a mindset! ⁣ ⁣ ⁣Self-confidence is the key to transformation, and transformation begins with KEEPING THE PROMISES YOU KEEP TO YOURSELF! No couple exemplifies this more than the amazing guests I have for you today.⁣ ⁣ They have BOTH transformed their lives from suffering from addiction and physical and mental pain to becoming world-renowned fitness and transformation experts, tv stars, and power couple. ⁣ ⁣ Not only have they transformed their own lives, but have changed the lives of millions of others. There is no other pair I would rather have on the topic of TRANSFORMATION than Chris and Heidi Powell!⁣ ⁣ This POWERFUL and DISTINGUISHED couple breaks down the step by step process to CHANGE YOUR LIFE for the BETTER, not just in losing weight, but in every area your life! ⁣ ⁣ Get an intimate look at how Chris and Heidi conquered their hardships, addiction, divorce, homelessness and so much more to becoming hit TV Stars on @ABCnetwork Extreme Weight Loss and transforming the lives of millions!⁣ ⁣ Regardless of what area of your life you are seeking a transformation in, this interview will provide you with the RIGHT STEPS TO TRANSFORMATION, and exactly what it takes for you to KEEP your promises to yourself.⁣ ⁣ It’s time to BREAK DOWN and BREAKTHROUGH! Your transformation is waiting! ⁣ ⁣ Keep the promise you made to yourself and LISTEN/WATCH NOW!!!⁣ ⁣
author: edwardmylett@yahoo.com (Ed Mylett)
